alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 10 at 12:42AM MST until December 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph over Marias Pass. * WHERE...Bad Rock Canyon, Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth, Essex, Marias Pass, Polebridge, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Potomac, Seeley Lake Region; West Glacier Region
